docs.snippet: The police said they had little information in the disappearance of a plaster sculpture that has been missing from the Kankakee County Museum since at least Dec. 11....
docs.lead_paragraph: The police said they had little information in the disappearance of a plaster sculpture that has been missing from the Kankakee County Museum since at least Dec. 11.
docs.abstract: Plaster study of one of Abraham Lincoln's hands by sculptor George Grey Barnard is stolen from  Kankakee County Museum in Illinois, where it has been on display for over two decades; hand has been missing since at least Dec 11 and local police investigation has yet to yield any suspects.

headline.main: Who’d Steal Lincoln’s Hand? Art Theft Baffles Illinois Museum
headline.print_headline: Who’d Steal Lincoln’s Hand? Art Theft Baffles Police and Museum in Illinois

docs.snippet: Killings spiked by nearly 70 percent last year in this gang-plagued Central American nation, authorities said Monday, resulting in a homicide rate that could make it the world's most violent country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Killings spiked by nearly 70 percent last year in this gang-plagued Central American nation, authorities said Monday, resulting in a homicide rate that could make it the world's most violent country.

headline.main: Homicides Up 70 Pct in El Salvador, Among Deadliest Nations
headline.print_headline: Homicides Up 70 Pct in El Salvador, Among Deadliest Nations

docs.snippet: Michael Kehoe doesn't want his 37-year career with Connecticut's Newtown Police Department defined by one event, but that's difficult when your sleepy suburban town of 28,000 people was the site of one of the country's deadliest school shootings....

headline.main: AP Interview: Retiring Newtown Police Chief Reflects

docs.snippet: A drug gang killed a newly installed mayor over the weekend as a warning to other officials to reject state police control of local cops and let cartels co-opt low-paid local officers, the governor of Morelos state said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A drug gang killed a newly installed mayor over the weekend as a warning to other officials to reject state police control of local cops and let cartels co-opt low-paid local officers, the governor of Morelos state said Monday.

headline.main: Governor Says Mexican Mayor's Killing a Warning by Drug Gang
